Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Bureaucratic \Bu`reau*crat"ic\, Bureaucratical \Bu`reau*crat"ic*al\, a. [Cf. F. bureaucratique.] Of, relating to, or resembling, a bureaucracy. [1913 Webster]
bureaucratic adj : of or relating to or resembling a bureaucrat or bureaucracy; "his bureaucratic behavior annoyed his colleagues"; "a bureaucratic nightmare"
